charinfo.name: Morino Ibiki
charinfo.description: A Konoha jounin, and the leader of the Torture and Interrogation force, Ibiki is a hard, sadistic man, who enjoys communicating through pain. Like his personality, Ibiki enjoys torturing his enemies, putting them in awkward situations where they have no choice but to lose.

abilities.name: Payback
abilities.description: Ibiki gains a permanent 10 points of damage reduction. For the rest of the game, Ibiki can use this skill to deal 15 damage to one enemy, and an additional 5 damage for each time a new damage skill was used on Ibiki since this skill was used. This damage resets each time it is used.

abilities.name: Summoning: Iron Maiden
abilities.description: Ibiki summons a giant cat and traps one enemy inside of it. For 3 turns, each time that enemy uses a new harmful skill that enemy will receive 25 piercing damage. Ibiki will also gain 30 destructible defense when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Summoning: Torture Chamber
abilities.description: Ibiki traps one enemy inside his torture chambers. For 3 turns, each turn that enemy does not use a new skill, they will receive 25 piercing damage. Ibiki will also gain 30 destructible defense when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Close Evasion
abilities.description: This skill makes Morino Ibiki invulnerable for 1 turn.
